names.english: opening stagnation and growing jade decoction
names.commonEnglish: Opening Stagnation and Growing Jade Decoction

actions: Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold, stops pain due to Blood Stasis and regulates the menses.
With Bai Shao, regulates and harmonizes Qi and Blood.
With Xiang Fu, tonifies the Blood and moves Qi, for premenstrual symptoms, menstrual pain and irregular menstruation.
Tonifies the Spleen and augments Qi Dries Dampness and promotes water metabolism
Nourishes the Blood, regulates menstruation, softens the Liver and relieves pain.
With Dang Gui, nourishes Yin and Blood.
Clears Heat, cools and harmonizes the Blood,clears Deficiency Fire, invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and clears Liver Fire.
Spreads and regulates Liver Qi, regulates menstruation and alleviates pain.
Drains Heat, generates Fluids, relieves toxicity, expels pus and reduces swelling.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness, strengthens the Spleen, harmonizes the Middle Jiao and transforms Phlegm.
With Bai Zhu, strengthens the Spleen and resolves Dampness.

modifications.purpose: breast distention that is painful with a burning sensation or is tender to the touch
